#include<stdio.h>
#define TRUE 1
#define l int
l count;
l carry(l n1,l n2){
    l car=0;
    while(n1&&n2){
    l temp1=n1%10;
    n1-=temp1;
    n1/=10;
    l temp2=n2%10;
    n2-=temp2;
    n2/=10;
    if((temp1+temp2+car)>=10){
        count++;
        car=((temp1+temp2)-((temp1+temp2)%10))/10;
        }
        else{
        car=0;}
     }
     return(count);
}
main(){
    int t=0;
    l n1,n2;
    while(TRUE){
        t++;
        count=0;
        scanf("%d%d",&n1,&n2);
        if(!(n1||n2)){
        break;}
        l hold=carry(n1,n2);
        if(hold==1){
            printf("1 carry operation.\n");
        }
        else if(hold==0){
        printf("No carry operation.\n");}
        else{
        printf("%d carry operations.\n",hold);
    }
    }
   return(0);
}
